overview: The Red Dragons were formed amidst security altercations and piles of broken glass in the summer of 1988. The Red Dragons first full length video, RDS/FSU/2002, was a comprehensive look at one of skateboardings most infamous crews.
tagline: The Red Dragons were formed amidst security altercations and piles of broken glass in the summer of 1988. The Red Dragons first full length video, RDS/FSU/2002, was a comprehensive look at one of skateboardings most infamous crews.
title: Enter the Red Dragon
